title: Charming Mascognaz Alpine Village Retreat Overlooking Monte Rosa with Onsite Spa & Turkish Bath
description:
This secluded Alpine refuge is perched high on a plateau above the Aosta Valley, promising an unforgettable escape with direct access to Italy's largest ski area. The accommodation showcases a beautifully converted 17th-century farmhouse and a charming collection of alpine chalets, perfect for creating cherished family memories of lush mountain meadows and exhilarating skiing.

Located a quick 20-minute drive from the Monte Rosa ski area, boasting over 200km of runs and access to Italy's renowned Three Valleys, you can enjoy thrilling ski mountaineering and personalised Nordic ski excursions led by expert guides. After a day on the pistes, return to Hotellerie de Mascognaz and decompress in the extensive spa facilities.
